title: Rimachi
description: The Kainers, a typical dysfunctional family living in the city, receives an unexpected invitation from a long-lost friend to visit his luxurious summer mansion in Peru. Everything seems to be going smoothly until they find themselves thrust into a dangerous situation with no way out. To protect his family, Kainer enters Rimachi, unaware that they have entered a deadly jungle and death is lurking around every corner. This thrilling adventure will test Kainer's paternal instincts and survival skills as he fights for not only his own life but also the lives of his children.
author: Adeerus Ghayan
